#!/bin/bash

# machine 1
ping -c1 ipadress &> /dev/null && echo "machine 1 is up" || echo "machine 1 is down"

# machine 2
ping -c1 ipadress &> /dev/null && echo "machine 2 is up" || echo "machine 2 is down"
# ..

 set interval to values less than 0.2 seconds.
